overview.en: Based on block chain encryption technology and consensus mechanism, links consumers, investors and project parties to provide global digital world enthusiasts with eco-social. At the same time, the introduction of third-party content and service providers through the IM open platform to build the global ecology of the block chain industry.
overview.zh: 基于区块链加密技术及共识机制，链接消费者、投资者和项目方，为全球数字世界爱好者提供全生态社交。同时，通过IM开放平台引入第三方内容和服务供应商，搭建区块链行业全球生态.
